data.prayer: Father, help your children in Val-de-Marne, Île-de-France, France find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Val-de-Marne, Île-de-France, France
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Val-de-Marne, Île-de-France, France.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Val-de-Marne. Through your servants plant 266 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Val-de-Marne, Île-de-France, France to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Berber, Shawiya people.

Jesus, strengthen the church in Val-de-Marne, Île-de-France, France by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Val-de-Marne, Île-de-France, France that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.section_summary:
the county of Val-de-Marne, Île-de-France, France has a population of 1,331,400.

We estimate Val-de-Marne has 16,359 people who might know Jesus, 814,178 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 500,863 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 814,178 cultural Christians in the county of Val-de-Marne to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'
